stable.body:
• Ability to check updates in app
• Animations while navigating
• Adjusted design of some components
• Optimization
stable.bodyMarkdown:
## Features
- **updates**: bottom sheet instead of alert dialog, markdown support [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/f155c72fa69240313eb1ba567b81a878898c50fa))
- dependency injection and viewmodels (#16) [#16](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/16) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/27ce6d94a61b09c0270502008b35830cf68574af))
- use material3 bottom sheet [#17](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/17) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/4315780dd5131eb0820e24174186b7a8ca7c0800))
- use material3 segmented buttons [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/921b093309fc15bd867f63bb321ac63df49efe0d))
- make updates more accessible (#18) [#18](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/18) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/3997bfe741b43e80c8397eab86d42a85666f03a8))
- improve splash screen [#19](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/19) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/e3fcfd61a3c9587a1f3ae9cacec56db6546510c0))
- general UI improvements [#20](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/20) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/1523a4da68fbf5333ee70314b57d31bd167c6024))
- scoped storage permissions & folder configuration [#22](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/22) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/4c3101e5d43096eadd03bf914ef29913e9a7beb3))
- navigation rail for wide screens and RTL fixes [#25](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/25) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/afced4100acde555e0c2169b305ad9738de35684))
- new map list & show thumbnail of chosen map [#26](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/26) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/903b6cbb70fdb311d9137cce4cdf840b1e446d34))
- open .zip files and links with PF Tool [#27](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/27) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/c52e9388666094b0034db2ad6f78fdae6356b6e8))

## Documentation
- update readme [skip ci] [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/a3157993a0ee8b7f95835ece2fbf1c3d9dfab7a2))

## Code Refactoring
- migrate to androidx navigation library [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/bf1753769ce8d8557d91b299f98042b770768729))
- **strings**: use `{}` instead of `%%` for placeholders [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/8af571d223c37ab85967e2cb0ea76c1b3008fe13))

## Continuous Integration
- update workflows [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/273e7af15fc2e8149f47d1c234cc8f4af12a44a0))
- **commit**: copy signed file instead of moving [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/aebd6f9251d47725b99099c07ecc2a9b10cf8dcc))
- bump actions/checkout to v4 [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/5c4602da9bbb4013f10ff35524016f0b294e8ade))

## Chores
- update target SDK, Gradle, AGP, Kotlin and dependencies [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/9a28ee6694219352a428659e8c53db249a0d355c))
- update TopToast [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/c7c4281e0aa8b9b5fc0e834f0f86ff29c99ddaad))
- add crowdin configuration [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/2662ec87ae8d66835631e9fecc44e50ed00b6e2f))
- bump dependencies [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/e6eeb7041c7bea9b04f9b5ce0953f1b6fcf2d0ac))
- bump version to 1.5.0 (15000) [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/60535802ff9fe48c9018617c07c148afd71d9ed0))
- merge dev branch into main (#14) [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/0a1bc2c8f36da7ec85c4bb9f5e7a944df3c4fe51))
- bump markdown dependency ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/92173a357c5a0b6007d72ee8f35885233fb15373))

View this release on [GitHub](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/releases/tag/v1.5.0)

preRelease.body:
• Ability to check updates in app
• Animations while navigating
• Adjusted design of some components
• Optimization

## Features
- **updates**: bottom sheet instead of alert dialog, markdown support [#14](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/14) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/f155c72fa69240313eb1ba567b81a878898c50fa))
